oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Climate Change and Organic Farming in Developing Countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fliessbach, Andreas
Amador, Manuel
Meirelles, Ana
Schwank, Othmar
Verhagen, Jan
Garibay, Salvador
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
"Organics" in general
Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: What is the role of organic farming in mitigating the consequences of climate changes? This session provides background information and intends to initiate a debate among policy makers and stakeholders.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Fliessbach, Andreas; Amador, Manuel; Meirelles, Ana; Schwank, Othmar; Verhagen, Jan and Garibay, Salvador (2007) Climate Change and Organic Farming in Developing Countries.
